name: HEXvolver
description:
A match-4 by spinning in a hexagonal grid!

A proof of concept version from my "Make an android game speedrun solo jam". 

In a few days will update with different shaped gems, game juice and special gems like match-5 gets you a bomb gem, match-6 gets you a lightning that goes to all sides and match-7 gets you a joker that if you match it with any other gem it removes all of that color/shaped gems.

The ultimate goal of this is to get a game on Google Play with (incentivized) ads, and this is just a proof of concept version. I'm going to gauge how people figure the game out and use that data to maybe do some simple tutorials etc. Depends on a lot on the feedback, so please feel free to comment any gripes and suggestions!
